alerts.no-trigger-if-not-on-combat-scene: Danger Zones will not trigger while you are not active on the current combat scene.
alerts.select-zone-start: Select a start location for this zone. Selected area will snap to grid and represent the top left corner of this zone.
alerts.select-zone-end: Select an end location for this zone. Selected area will snap to grid and represent the lower right corner of this zone.
alerts.select-target: Select a location to target in the Danger Zone. Selected area will snap to grid and represent the top left and bottom right corners of the zone.

edit-form.allInArea.label: Target All Tokens In Targeted Area
edit-form.allInArea.description: If more than one token is in a target area, they will all be targeted. Otherwise only one random token is targeted.
edit-form.bleed.label: Bleed
edit-form.bleed.description: Determines if the effect boundary (based on the Type's width and height) will exceed this zone's boundary. If not set, units closer to center within the zone have a greater likelihood of being targeted.

boundary.end.label: End:
boundary.label: Dimensions
boundary.description: The zone's starting and ending x and y position. The zone dimensions will use the center points of the grids that hold these positions.
boundary.start.label: Start:
boundary.x.label: x
boundary.y.label: y

edit-form.enabled.label: Active
edit-form.enabled.description: Zone is active and will trigger following trigger settings (can be toggled from scene navigation.)
edit-form.flavor.label: Flavor
edit-form.flavor.description: Flavor will output to chat message when zone triggers.
edit-form.likelihood.label: Likelihood
edit-form.likelihood.description: The likelihood that effects will generate on trigger.
edit-form.name: Configure Danger Zone
edit-form.placeTemplate.label: Choose Location
edit-form.placeTemplate.description: Prompts you to select the scene position to target (otherwise position is randomly selected.)
edit-form.random.label: Randomize
edit-form.random.description: All danger zones in this scene that share the same trigger are grouped and only one is triggered at random. Assign a weight to control how often one triggers in relation to the others.
edit-form.replace.label: Replace Lasting Effect
edit-form.replace.description: Choose whether effect replaces any existing lasting effects on when it triggers.
edit-form.runUntilTokenFound.label: Always Hits a Token
edit-form.runUntilTokenFound.description: The effect will target an area of the zone where at least one token is present.
edit-form.title.label: Title
edit-form.trigger.label: Trigger
edit-form.trigger.description: Select how this danger zone will be triggered on this scene
edit-form.type.label: Type
edit-form.type.description: Select a default or custom type
edit-form.weight.label: Weight

import.title: Import Danger Zone Types
import.noFile: You did not upload a data file!
import.error: failed import due to invalid data
import.skipped: skipped because id is duplicate of an existing type.

replace-types.A.label: Clear All Lasting Effects
replace-types.N.label: Retain Existing Effects
replace-types.R.label: Clear Effects With This Trigger
replace-types.T.label: Clear Effects With This Zone Type
replace-types.Z.label: Clear Effects Of This Zone

scene.description: Add danger zone effects to this scene (this will cause form refresh so save any scene changes before proceeding).
scene.label: Danger Zone
scene.random-trigger.label: Random Manual Trigger
scene.title: Title

setting.danger-zone-types-config.name: Danger Zone Types
setting.danger-zone-types-config.label: Configure Danger Zone Types
setting.scene-control-button-display.label: Display Clear Effects Button
setting.scene-control-button-display.description: Toggles the display of the Clear Danger Zone Effects button within the scene control buttons tiles grouping
setting.types-button-display.label: Display Types Button
setting.types-button-display.description: Toggles the display of the Danger Zone Types button at the bottom of the scenes side bar
setting.scene-enabled-default.label: New Zone Active by Default
setting.scene-enabled-default.description: Select whether or not new danger zones default to active when you first create them.

active-effect.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear the active effect data?
active-effect.label: Apply Active Effect to Target
active-effect.notes: Active effect will be transferred to each target in the danger zone.
active-effect.edit.title: Edit Active Effect
active-effect.delete.title: Delete Active Effect
active-effect.cleared.info: Active effect data has been deleted from this zone type.

type-form.animation.label: Animation
type-form.area-x.label: Width (Grid Units)
type-form.area-y.label: Height (Grid Units)
type-form.dimensions.label: Dimensions

fluidCanvas.delay.label: Delay (ms)
fluidCanvas.duration.label: Duration (ms)
fluidCanvas.intensity.label: Intensity
fluidCanvas.iteration.label: Iteration
fluidCanvas.label: Kandashi's Fluid Canvas
fluidCanvas.type.label: Type
fluidCanvas.notes: Invokes Fluid Canvas effects at the start of the zone effect.

type-form.icon.label: Icon
type-form.macro.label: Macro
type-form.macro.notes: The macro in this world that will run when the danger zone triggers.

monks-active-tiles.label: Monk's Active Tiles
monks-active-tiles.notes: These triggers will be added to the tile that is created by the active effect.

type-form.name.label: Name

token-says.compendium.label: Compendium
token-says.label: Token Says
token-says.notes: Trigger Token Says functionality for a given playlist or rolltable source. Entering a data into 'Token Says' field will always say that thing or play that playlist's track, otherwise the source data is randomized.
token-says.rule-type.label: Type
token-says.says.label: Token Says
token-says.source.label: Source

warpgate.actor.label: Name
warpgate.duplicates.label: Duplicates
warpgate.delay.label: Delay
warpgate.isRolltable.label: Is Rolltable
warpgate.label: Warpgate
warpgate.notes: Spawn creatures using the actor name or, if 'Is Rolltable' is checked, spawn will be random actor matching name pulled from the specified rolltable in this world.
